content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for coming to view the apartment. I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a premium rent for this 25 square meter apartment. What is your budget for a monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay up to 800 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's a good offer, Max. However, I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a higher rent. I am looking for someone who is willing to pay at least 900 Euros per month. Would you be able to meet that amount?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 900 Euros per month. Is that acceptable?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Yes, that is acceptable. I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month. Thank you for your interest in the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
